word:
You see the work that has been established here. You see that 

                                                               85. 

advancement has been made, and that the education has been carried forward in right lines. This work of opposition and dissatisfaction has come from the devil. It has cost the life of a wife and mother. But it has not taken away her crown of eternal life, nor hindered her from receiving the commendation, "Well done, good and faithful servant, . . . enter thou into the joy of thy Lord."
